channel.title: ::master command help
channel.description:
can someone tell me what the ::master command is becuase i have been searching for that for the past 10 minutes. If someone has a link to a topic where it tells you the command thats great and if someone knows it and post that great too.
EDIT: I got the command from the pimpscape source so please delete this, I don't know how to.
Thanks, ~~Indiantiger~~

item.title: ::master command help
item.dc:creator: @Indiantiger Indiantiger
item.description:
@Indiantiger wrote:

thanks ed_ere!!

item.title: ::master command help
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

But, I used it for testscape… It didn’t work properly… Every skill was 135/99 except attk, str, def, fish, mage, range, agility was all 1/99… That’s why I switched to Evilscape…

Read full topic

item.title: ::master command help
item.dc:creator: @Ed_ere Ed_ere
item.description:
@Ed_ere wrote:

the code for a master command…Add it into the rest of your commands in client.java

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("All levels are now maxed!!"); }

If you want to change the rights of the player to use the command its the

playerRights >= 2)

1=mod
2=admin
3=owner

Read full topic

item.title: ::master command help
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

Personally I like Evilscape, which comes with the master command… which boots your skills to 135 if you didn’t already know… But, other players can reach the same combat level as the admin so I’m looking for a way to change that…

Read full topic

item.title: ::master command help
item.dc:creator: @cocoa7 cocoa7
item.description:
@cocoa7 wrote:

the master commant is in your client java search for “master” without quotes. like i said its in your client java and offhand it usually is only for owner (playerrights = 3)

Read full topic
